attributes.action: Make all companies be responsible for their plastic waste and recycle properly
attributes.additional_details: In Germany people take bottles etc back to stores and they send back to the company to recycle properly back into its original state and sold. It can make government money and create a mass of new jobs.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign the following petitions:

Deposit scheme on glass, plastic, steel, aluminium bottles and cans.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572535

Establish a national waste plastic collection/recycling programme for England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553651

Introduce a Product Redundancy Tax.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551755
